comments_since_last_sample.body: Maybe you can help me. I have a ceilinglight that I want to upgrade. With black, mirror paper and sparkley beads. Any ideas?

I work for Dollartree and look at these items everyday at work. I dont think nothing of it until I watch your videos. I swear, You have " magic hands" and should have a bigger platform. 
You deserve a cable tv spot like those " House Flip" shows... You should have a Show creating pieces on a budget or atleast a endorsement with Dollartree or somethin because you're amazing.
